results.title: Phoenix’s Month in Hell: A 31-Day Streak of Record Heat Ends
results.abstract: A continuous stretch of days reaching or exceeding 110 degrees has filled emergency rooms. On Monday, the city hit 108 degrees, breaking the run, but setting a new, brutal record.
